data.lyric:
[ti:Run]
[ar:Joji]
[al:Run]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Run - Joji
[00:03.03]Lyrics by：Daniel Wilson/Justin Parker/George Miller
[00:06.06]Composed by：Daniel Wilson/Justin Parker/George Miller
[00:09.09]I fell for your magic I tasted your skin
[00:18.10]And though this is tragic at least I found the end
[00:26.18]I witnessed your madness you shed light on my sins
[00:34.73]And if we share in this sadness
[00:38.34]Then where have you been
[00:41.25]I know you're not in love like you used to be
[00:46.02]Guess I'm not the one like you used to think
[00:50.44]So you'll just run
[00:58.52]I know that I'm stuck in this misery
[01:02.90]Guess I'm not enough like you used to think
[01:07.50]So I'll just run
[01:17.49]You bathe in your victory you blew out all my fuse
[01:26.05]And if I took on the planet will I pay my dues
[01:34.42]Your love was a mystery yeah my love is a fool
[01:43.23]And I traveled the country just to get to you
[01:49.48]I know you're not in love like you used to be
[01:54.29]Guess I'm not the one like you used to think
[01:58.74]So you'll just run
[02:06.85]I know that I'm stuck in this misery
[02:11.27]Guess I'm not enough like you used to think
[02:15.82]So I'll just run
[02:53.98]And I traveled the country just to get to you
[03:01.20]I know you're not in love
[03:05.64]I know you're not in love
[03:10.51]Know you're not in love
data.trans:
[ti:Run]
[ar:Joji]
[al:Run]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.03]//
[00:06.06]//
[00:09.09]我为你的魔力倾倒 我品尝你的美好
[00:18.10]尽管很悲伤 至少我走到了结局
[00:26.18]我见证了你的疯狂 你揭露了我的罪行
[00:34.73]本该一同分享悲伤
[00:38.34]可你却不见了踪影
[00:41.25]我知道你不像从前那般在乎这段感情了
[00:46.02]也许因为我并不是你曾以为的那个人吧
[00:50.44]所以你会毅然离去
[00:58.52]我知道我陷入了痛苦之中
[01:02.90]我想我总归抵不上你对我的预期
[01:07.50]所以我会颓然离去
[01:17.49]你享受胜利的喜悦 浇灭我所有的希望
[01:26.05]如果我融入不属于我的星球 我需要付出代价吗
[01:34.42]你的爱叫人捉摸不透 我的爱痴痴傻傻
[01:43.23]我踏遍国土只为了找到你
[01:49.48]我知道你不像从前那般在乎这段感情了
[01:54.29]也许因为我并不是你曾以为的那个人吧
[01:58.74]所以你会毅然离去
[02:06.85]我知道我陷入了痛苦之中
[02:11.27]我想我总归抵不上你对我的预期
[02:15.82]所以我会颓然离去
[02:53.98]我踏遍国土只为了找到你
[03:01.20]我知道你不再爱我了
[03:05.64]我知道你不再爱我了
[03:10.51]你不再爱我了
